com.ejavashop.web.controller.order

类 OrdersController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ejavashop.web.controller.BaseController
      • com.ejavashop.web.controller.order.OrdersController

  • @Controller
public class OrdersController
extends BaseController
    购物流程-订单
    本controller中得请求都需要登录才能访问
